text: Jastrzębowski, feminine: Jastrzębowska, plural: Jastrzębowscy is a Polish- language surname. It may be phonetically spelled as Jastrzembowski/Jastrzembowska. It is a toponymic surname derived from one of the several Polish locations named Jastrzębowo and literally meaning "one from Jastrzębowo". Ultimately derived from jastrząb, or "hawk". It is Russified as Yastrzhembovsky / Yastrzhembovskaya (). Notable people with this surname include: *Janusz Jastrzębowski, drummer of Polish band Artrosis *Jerzy Jastrzębowski (born 1951), Polish footballer and manager *Wojciech Jastrzębowski (1799–1882), Polish scientist, naturalist and inventor, professor of botanic, physics, zoology and horticulture ==See also== *Jastrzębski Category:Polish-language surnames Category:Toponymic surnames
title: Jastrzębowski
